Turiroa ends bull season with sellout sale: Final two sales raise $7500 for Wairoa Mayoral Relief Fund https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/07/06/turiroa-end-bull-sales-season-on-a-high/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/07/06/turiroa-end-bull-sales-season-on-a-high/ Murray RobertsonTuriroa Angus has a total clearance sale, Kenhardt sells 46 out of 49. Sat, 06 Jul 2024 06:00:27 +0000 Turiroa Angus near Wairoa finished the sales season by selling all 51 of its R2 bulls on Thursday afternoon. Photo / Emma Pollitt
Missing Wairarapa man Ben Fox found dead in the Mangatere Valley, death referred to corner https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/missing-wairarapa-man-ben-fox-found-dead-in-the-mangatere-valley-death-referred-to-corner/HIYTV6PVEFDUBMF4AGGDXWWNOU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/missing-wairarapa-man-ben-fox-found-dead-in-the-mangatere-valley-death-referred-to-corner/HIYTV6PVEFDUBMF4AGGDXWWNOU/ Police thanked people who helped in the search, which came to a tragic end. Sat, 06 Jul 2024 04:02:33 +0000 56-year-old Ben Fox, also known as Sam, had been reported missing since Wednesday, July 3.
Taranaki meth dealer Kodee Kee-Sue jailed for 13 years and seven months https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/taranaki-meth-dealer-kodee-kee-sue-jailed-for-13-years-and-seven-months/RQDM4TA7NBGEFKX3IJLPCLPF7I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/taranaki-meth-dealer-kodee-kee-sue-jailed-for-13-years-and-seven-months/RQDM4TA7NBGEFKX3IJLPCLPF7I/ Tara ShaskeyNow Kodee Kee-Sue has been jailed for more than 13 years. Sat, 06 Jul 2024 04:00:00 +0000 A judge at New Plymouth District Court rejected a claim that Kodee Kee-Sue was a low-level meth dealer and sentenced him to more than 13 years behind bars.
Family remember mum and son, 11, killed in Manapōuri, Southland house fire https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/family-remember-mum-and-son-11-killed-in-manapouri-southland-house-fire/R6DOJYZAVBG3TJPWWN2O43NMBM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/family-remember-mum-and-son-11-killed-in-manapouri-southland-house-fire/R6DOJYZAVBG3TJPWWN2O43NMBM/ Mother had a heart condition and “wouldn’t have been able to escape” - daughter Sat, 06 Jul 2024 03:58:32 +0000 Kelly Kerr, left, 11, and his mum Kelly Kemble Kerr died on Thursday when their home in rural West Southland was destroyed by fire. Photo / Facebook

Vendor ordered to pay $29,000 compensation to fix faulty drain three years after home sold https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/vendor-ordered-to-pay-29000-compensation-to-fix-faulty-drain-third-years-after-home-sold/UF73OUMJDRBALLVPOGN7NCONQ4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/vendor-ordered-to-pay-29000-compensation-to-fix-faulty-drain-third-years-after-home-sold/UF73OUMJDRBALLVPOGN7NCONQ4/ Tracy NealFormer owner liable for $29k repair costs because of what he said when he owned it. Sat, 06 Jul 2024 02:00:00 +0000 A former homeowner has been found liable by the Disputes Tribunal for the cost of repairs to drainage based on an inaccurate statement he made when selling the property three years ago. Photo / 123rf

Te Whetu Cashell jailed for Auckland, Hamilton mall heists, prison attacks https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/te-whetu-cashell-jailed-for-auckland-hamilton-mall-heists-prison-attacks/GIK5YY3V35CODMTVPRHMSJ76KA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/te-whetu-cashell-jailed-for-auckland-hamilton-mall-heists-prison-attacks/GIK5YY3V35CODMTVPRHMSJ76KA/ Craig KapitanTwo brazen daytime heists, both terrifying shoppers at crowded malls, netted $850,000. Fri, 05 Jul 2024 23:31:23 +0000 Auckland resident Te Whetu Cashell has been sentenced to prison after pleading guilty to a series of violent jewellery store robberies and prison attacks ranging from 2022 to 2024.
